metadata.title: CVE-2021-3596 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A NULL pointer dereference flaw was found in ImageMagick in versions priorto 7.0.10-31 in ReadSVGImage() in coders/svg.c. This issue is due to notchecking the return value from libxml2's xmlCreatePushParserCtxt() and usesthe value directly, which leads to a crash and segmentation fault.

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
